// HUD
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 gColor;
//   row_major float4x4 gTranslate;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   gTranslate   c200     4
//   gColor       c208     1
//

    vs_3_0
def c222, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.3
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_texcoord v1
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_color o2
dcl_2d s0
    mul r0, c201, v0.y
    mad r0, v0.x, c200, r0
    mad r0, v0.z, c202, r0
//    add o0, r0, c203
    add r30, r0, c203
    mov o1, v1
    mov o2, c208

texldl r31, c222.z, s0 // r31.x = separation
mad r30.x, r31.x, c222.w, r30.x // X = X + separation * c222.w
mov o0, r30

// approximately 6 instruction slots used
